verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which came to \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, and go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and there I will cause thee to \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* my \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.

Then I went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, he \w wrought|strong="H6213"\w* a \w work|strong="H4399"\w* on the \w wheels|strong="H0070"\w*.\f + \fr 18.3 \ft wheels: or, frames, or, seats\f*

And the \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w* that he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* of \w clay|strong="H2563"\w* was \w marred|strong="H7843"\w* in the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*: so he \w made|strong="H6213"\w* it \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w vessel|strong="H3627"\w*, as \w seemed|strong="H5869"\w* \w good|strong="H3474"\w* to the \w potter|strong="H3335"\w* to \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \add it\add*.\f + \fr 18.4 \ft of clay…: or, was marred, as clay in the hand of the potter\f*\f + \fr 18.4 \ft made it…: Heb. returned and made, etc\f*
Then the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* I \w do|strong="H6213"\w* with you as this \w potter|strong="H3335"\w*? \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*. Behold, as the \w clay|strong="H2563"\w* \add is\add* in the \w potter’s|strong="H3335"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, so \add are\add* ye in mine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\add At what\add* \w instant|strong="H7281"\w* I shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* concerning a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, and concerning a \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, to pluck \w up|strong="H5428"\w*, and to pull \w down|strong="H5422"\w*, and to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* \add it;\add*

If that \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, against whom I have \w pronounced|strong="H1696"\w*, \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from their \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, I will \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* that I \w thought|strong="H2803"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* unto them.

And \add at what\add* \w instant|strong="H7281"\w* I shall \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* concerning a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*, and concerning a \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*, to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* and to \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \add it;\add*

If it \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*, that it \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* not my \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, then I will \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* of the \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, wherewith I \w said|strong="H0559"\w* I would \w benefit|strong="H3190"\w* them.

¶ Now therefore go to, \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* to the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and to the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \w frame|strong="H3335"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* against you, and \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* a \w device|strong="H4284"\w* against you: \w return|strong="H7725"\w* ye now every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and make your \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* and your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w* \w good|strong="H3190"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, There is no \w hope|strong="H2976"\w*: but we will \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* our own \w devices|strong="H4284"\w*, and we will every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* the \w imagination|strong="H8307"\w* of his \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w Ask|strong="H7592"\w* ye now among the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*, who hath \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* such things: the \w virgin|strong="H1330"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* hath \w done|strong="H6213"\w* a \w very|strong="H3966"\w* horrible \w thing|strong="H8186"\w*.

Will \add a man\add* \w leave|strong="H5800"\w* the \w snow|strong="H7950"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* \add which cometh\add* from the \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*? \add or\add* shall the \w cold|strong="H7119"\w* \w flowing|strong="H5140"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* that come from another \w place|strong="H2114"\w* be \w forsaken|strong="H5428"\w*?\f + \fr 18.14 \ft the snow…: or, my fields for a rock, or for the snow of Lebanon? shall the running waters be forsaken for the strange cold waters?\f*

Because my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* hath \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w* me, they have burned \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* to \w vanity|strong="H7723"\w*, and they have caused them to \w stumble|strong="H3782"\w* in their \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \add from\add* the \w ancient|strong="H5769"\w* \w paths|strong="H7635"\w*, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in \w paths|strong="H5410"\w*, \add in\add* a \w way|strong="H1870"\w* not cast \w up|strong="H5549"\w*;

To \w make|strong="H7760"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w desolate|strong="H8047"\w*, \add and\add* a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w hissing|strong="H8292"\w*; every one that \w passeth|strong="H5674"\w* thereby shall be \w astonished|strong="H8074"\w*, and \w wag|strong="H5110"\w* his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*.

I will \w scatter|strong="H6327"\w* them as with an \w east|strong="H6921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*; I will \w shew|strong="H7200"\w* them the \w back|strong="H6203"\w*, and not the \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of their \w calamity|strong="H0343"\w*.

¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they, \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w devise|strong="H2803"\w* \w devices|strong="H4284"\w* against \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w*; for the \w law|strong="H8451"\w* shall not \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* from the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, nor \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* from the \w wise|strong="H2450"\w*, nor the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* from the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*. \w Come|strong="H3212"\w*, and let us \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* him with the \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, and let us not give \w heed|strong="H7181"\w* to any of his \w words|strong="H1697"\w*.\f + \fr 18.18 \ft with…: or, for the tongue\f*
Give \w heed|strong="H7181"\w* to me, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* to the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of them that \w contend|strong="H3401"\w* with me.

Shall \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* be \w recompensed|strong="H7999"\w* for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*? for they have \w digged|strong="H3738"\w* a \w pit|strong="H7745"\w* for my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*. \w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* that I \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee to \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* for them, \add and\add* to turn \w away|strong="H7725"\w* thy \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* from them.

Therefore deliver \w up|strong="H5414"\w* their \w children|strong="H1121"\w* to the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and pour \w out|strong="H5064"\w* their \add blood\add* by the \w force|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and let their \w wives|strong="H0802"\w* be \w bereaved|strong="H7909"\w* of their children, and \add be\add* \w widows|strong="H0490"\w*; and let their \w men|strong="H0582"\w* be \w put|strong="H2026"\w* to \w death|strong="H4194"\w*; \add let\add* their young \w men|strong="H0970"\w* \add be\add* \w slain|strong="H5221"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* in \w battle|strong="H4421"\w*.\f + \fr 18.21 \ft pour…: Heb. pour them out\f*

Let a \w cry|strong="H2201"\w* be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* from their \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, when thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* a \w troop|strong="H1416"\w* \w suddenly|strong="H6597"\w* upon them: for they have \w digged|strong="H3738"\w* a \w pit|strong="H7745"\w* to \w take|strong="H3920"\w* me, and \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* \w snares|strong="H6341"\w* for my \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*.

Yet, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* all their \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w* against me to \w slay|strong="H4194"\w* \add me:\add* \w forgive|strong="H3722"\w* not their \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, neither blot \w out|strong="H4229"\w* their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* from thy \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*, but let them be \w overthrown|strong="H3782"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee; \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \add thus\add* with them in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*.\f + \fr 18.23 \ft to slay…: Heb. for death\f*
